user.title: Connect to Aira Cloud
user.description: Enter your Aira account credentials to list your avaiable devices

select_device.title: Select Your Heat Pump
select_device.description: Found **{device_count} device(s)** in your Aira account. Select the heat pump you want to add

configure.title: Configure Data Polling
configure.description: Set how often data should be fetched from your heat pump. Default is **{default_interval} seconds**. Lower values provide more frequent updates but may cause more errors

manual_entry.title: Enter MAC Address
manual_entry.description: Enter the Bluetooth MAC address of your Aira Heat Pump

bluetooth_confirm.title: Confirm Aira Heat Pump
bluetooth_confirm.description:
Discovered device: **{name}**
MAC Address: `{address}`

Do you want to add this device?

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Please check the MAC address and ensure the device is powered on and within range.
error.invalid_mac: Invalid MAC address format. Please use format XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX
error.invalid_auth: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials.
error.no_devices_found: No devices found in your Aira account.

abort.bluetooth_unavailable: Bluetooth is not available. Please ensure Bluetooth is enabled on your Home Assistant host.
abort.device_not_found: Invalid device. Selected device was not found.
abort.ble_device_not_found: BLE device not found. Make sure your heat pump is powered on and within Bluetooth range (10-30m). If the device is too far try using a bluetooth adapter or bluetooth repeaters like esphome.
abort.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the selected device. Please ensure your heat pump is powered on and within range.
abort.not_aira_device: The discovered device is not an Aira Heat Pump.
abort.unknown: An unexpected error occurred during setup.

init.title: Configure Aira Heat Pump
init.description: Update the settings for your Aira Heat Pump

invalid_temperature.message: Temperature must be one of: {allowed_temperatures}°C. Received: {temperature}°C. Use + / - button if unsure.

scheduler_active.message: Cannot set temperature while scheduler is active. Please disable the scheduler first.
